name: Baldi's Basics Plus Scratched
description:
Baldi's Basics Plus Scratched  Is A Baldi Game Thats Just Like Baldi The Real Game 

The Story: OH NOES You Freind Has Lost His Noteboks Again And You Have To find The notebooks But There On Three Different Get Them All And Escape

Instructions: Use WASD And Touch the notebooks To Collect Them

What All The Characters Do:

Baldi: Do Not Touch Baldi Or That Will Be A Game Over

Bully:  He Blocks  Hallways

Playtime: If You Touch Her She Will Want To Play Jumprope Press Space Five Times And She Will Let You Go

1st Prize: If You Touch Him He Will  Drag You With Him

Gotta Sweep: Does The Same Thig As 1st Prize

THE HAND: If You Touch Him He Will Hand You And The Hand Can Make You Go Though Walls

You Can play it on scratch Here: Baldi's Basics Plus Scratched on Scratch (mit.edu)
